sys_hub_action_instance_v2.comment: One approval
Set approval and status fields to approved
Send email to manager to notify
Send email to approvers about cancellation
Send email about cancellation
Set approval and status fields to rejected
Send email to system admin to notify
Set approval and status to rejected
Send to user email about submission
Send email to user about status
Send email to manager to notify
Two approvals
Set approval to approved (and status but might delete)
Set Status to Pending and Approval to Requested
